default.label: Label
description:
Adds a button. This is useful for creating an optional answer.

If you want to add multiple buttons, use [field.button-radio-group](field.button-radio-group.md).

The button size depends on the length of the text.

[View example in the sandbox](https://ya.cc/t/olwvj7493tyzBh)
properties.disabled.description: This property prevents clicking the button. If the value is `true`, the button is not active (a Toloker will not be able to click it).
properties.valueToSet.description: The value of the output data when the button is clicked.
